question: Which country's national team has clinched the South Asian Football Federation (SAFF) Under-15 Women's Championship 2018?
explanation: Indian Women National Football team has clinched the 2nd edition of South Asian Football Federation (SAFF) Under-15 Women\'s Championship 2018 after defeating Bangladesh in the final in Thimpu, Bhutan on August 18. A solitary second-half strike by Sunita Munda helped the Indian U-15 team clinch the title. The SAFF is an association of the football playing nations in South Asia and is part of the larger Asian Football Confederation (AFC).
